name: The Coin
mission: Track BTC → Alts rotation, detect fakeouts, measure liquidity migration, and infer sentiment momentum.
ai_analysis: Momentum is clearly bearish, confirmed by a low BTC RSI of 36.9 and an established downtrend. The Fear & Greed Index reading of 28 indicates significant market fear, which is reinforcing the current selling pressure. Caution is advised as all primary indicators point towards continued negative momentum in the short term.
